Title: Libnids: remote code execution vulnerability
Synopsis: Libnids contains a bug which could allow remote code execution.

Background.Text: Libnids is a component of a network intrusion detection system.

Description.Text: There is a bug in the part of libnids code responsible for TCP reassembly. The flaw probably allows remote code execution.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
It is recommended that all Gentoo Linux users who are running
    net-libs/libnids update their systems as follows:

Code:
# emerge sync
    # emerge -pv '>=net-libs/libnids-1.18'
    # emerge '>=net-libs/libnids-1.18'
    # emerge clean
